Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Select a set of modified stage files. These will remove redundant overrides for Sonic's physics in certain stages, allowing him to handle more consistently.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Select whether Modern Sonic will have the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button or the Jump button. (Note that the HedgeModManager 'Homing Attack on Boost' code by SWS90 will override this choice.)

Elements.Name: IncludeDir2
Description: Select whether or not Classic Sonic will use a set of physics based more directly on Sonic Unleashed.
Files recommended for use with the standard game's levels.
Files recommended for use with the Unleashed Project.
Load no alternate stage files. Recommended for use with most other stage mods.
Map the Homing Attack to the Boost button.
Map the Homing Attack to the Jump button.
Classic Sonic will handle more similarly to Unleashed Sonic.
Classic Sonic will use his original physics from Sonic Generations, or from another mod if applicable.
